Text: you wanna know what one the biggest problems in the world is my friend, it's too many people like yourself that think that they have any say or influence over anything major that happens in the world. You need to concede to yourself that you are just as ineffectual and lame as everyone else and get on with your life as best you can.

Actually the biggest problem in the world is people like you that are negative that engage people like me who are positive and productive and actually have something to show for it.
I knew full well ahead of time I'd be up against a wall of opposition and rude comments from people such as yourself. Be it meant in the nicest way possible or just plain slandering, I know very well how to deal with people like you. WHITE SMOKE JIM
